fields.System.Title: 1. Create VNETs for Data Science Virtual Machines
fields.System.Description:
Secure VNet with subnets for DSVMs and private endpoints for PaaS services (AML, Storage etc)

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/reference-architectures/hybrid-networking/network-level-segmentation?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 1. Privileged Identity Management
fields.System.Description:
Once you have deployed your landing zone, identity is a key element to be addressed:

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/identity-and-access-management?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 2. Configure network peering
fields.System.Description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-network/virtual-network-peering-overview?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 1. Data Movement
fields.System.Description: Define data movement into the environment and specifically around who has access to data in each stage

fields.System.Title: 1. Build Landing Zone Storage
fields.System.Description:
Build storage for data owners to upload data to Azure in less secure area via https

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/framework/security/storage-data-encryption?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 3. Azure Key Vault
fields.System.Description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/basic-concepts?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 2. Multi-factor Authentication
fields.System.Description:
A key component in securing your identity and environment is with the use of multi-factor authentication. Regulatory compliance such as CIS and NIST both have controls for multi-factor auth.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-mfa-howitworkshttps://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/identity-and-access-management?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 4. Configure SRE Storage Account
fields.System.Description:
Add storage account.  Only accessible via private endpoint - no public access

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/private-link/tutorial-private-endpoint-storage-portal#:~:text=Create%20storage%20account%20with%20a%20private%20endpoint%201,Select%20copy%20on%20the%20Connection%20string%20for%20key1.?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 5. Configure ADF
fields.System.Description:
Configure ADF to pick up data from less secure storage and move into the SRE and delete the original copy on the less secure storage

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/quickstart-create-data-factory-portal?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 3. Define Roles for RBAC
fields.System.Description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/identity-and-access-management?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 2. Data Governance
fields.System.Description:
Refer to the Cloud Adoption Framework governance methodology: 

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/govern/methodology?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

Deep dive on Data classification, security and data annotation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/innovate/best-practices/data-classificationhttps://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/govern/methodology?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 6. Data Science Virtual Machine (DSVM)
fields.System.Description:
Configure DSVM (Windows or Linux) - Preferable to add AAD or AD integration when possible for authentication so logins can be individually attributable and logged without local computer accounts.  Add all libraries required prior to closing down network to internet.  Provide access to Secure Storage Account (mount drive - blobfuse etc.)

Windows: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/data-science-virtual-machine/provision-vm?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

Linux: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/data-science-virtual-machine/dsvm-ubuntu-intro?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

Using an ARM template: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/data-science-virtual-machine/dsvm-tutorial-resource-manager?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 1. Validate Azure Security Center
fields.System.Description:
Tutorial: investigate the health of the resources:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/investigate-resource-health?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 4. Deploy Enterprise-scale landing zone

Use automation to respond: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/tutorial-respond-threats-playbook?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 2. Documented Processes for communication
fields.System.Description:
Establish a process for driving documentation and project updates.

Possible tools:
  • Teams and or SharePoint
  • Azure DevOps or GitHub wikis
  • Microsoft Sway for online publications

fields.System.Title: 2. Define Policy Requirements
fields.System.Description: These will be a mix of regulatory and institutional policies required.  This will be where we initially agree on exemptions (Duo for MFA etc)

fields.System.Title: 1. Define encryption and key management
fields.System.Description:
• Ensure data privacy, compliance, and data residency in Azure
  • Leverage Azure Key Vault for encryption key, secret, and certificate management and establish an automated process for key and certificate rotation
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/security-governance-and-compliance?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Description:
Note Log Analytics Workspace ID - this could be used as a parameter when policies are assigned as well as a Sentinel enabled workspace.
Enterprise-scale enables central logging

allocate IP ranges for SRE VNET and peering strategies with hub and other spokes (WVD, AD DS, etc.)

fields.System.Title: 3. Establish Cost Management
fields.System.Description:
Cost Management is a core discipline of the govern methodology. Ensure that objectives and outcomes are defined.

fields.System.Title: 2. Subscription Organization and Governance

fields.System.Title: 1. Review management group hierarchy

fields.System.Description:
Use NSGs or firewalls to limit internet traffic from SRE to only essential services/ports

Log Analytics Agent
Guest Config
WVD
Qualys

fields.System.Title: Monitor/Logging
fields.System.Description: This should be done before application of policies - Log Analytics Workspace will need to be configured and identified prior to policy deployment.

fields.System.Title: 4. Data/Model Exportation Requirements
fields.System.Description: What should be allowed out of the SRE?  Manual approval?  Automated?

fields.System.Description: Will we use Azure Monitor/Log Analytics or on prem.

fields.System.Description:

The following Azure DevOps project will step you through deploying Sentinel: https://azuredevopsdemogenerator.azurewebsites.net/?name=azuresentinel

fields.System.Title: 1. Define SRE Research Team
fields.System.Description: Key stakeholder who will speak to usability, who will be the data owners and users.

fields.System.Title: 3. Define SRE Security Team
fields.System.Description:
Resources dedicated to project - accountable for security decisions for the institution.  

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-security?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 1. Define Secure Research Environment (SRE) and Governance Risk & Compliance Team

Guidance for cloud functions: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/organize/cloud-governance?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 2. Define SRE IT Team

fields.System.Title: 1. Define Existing Environment
fields.System.Description: Networking, AD, AAD etc.

fields.System.Title: 2. Define required libraries - packages
fields.System.Description: The customer should enumerate the packages and libraries they want installed on the DSVM or configured in the SRE

fields.System.Title: 1. Define preferred work environment
fields.System.Description:
Linux vs Windows Data Science Virtual Machine (DSVM).  Agree on OS and style (Linux DSVM is a specific distro - customer should be encouraged to use Azure DSVM images).

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/data-science-virtual-machine/overview?WT.mc_id=devops_userstory_service_secureresearch-inproduct-devopsportal

fields.System.Title: 1. Enable Azure Defender
fields.System.Description:
Enable Azure Defender (Security Center Standard) to enable vulnerability management, compliance dashboard.
